About Me

Passionate Game Designer

I'm an aspiring game designer with a strong foundation in level design, gameplay mechanics, and player experience. My passion for games started at an early age, and I've dedicated my education and personal projects to understanding what makes games engaging and meaningful.

With a background in production, design, and tech art, I bring a holistic approach to game development - balancing creative vision with practical execution.

I am seeking an entry-level position at a world-class game studio where I can contribute my skills while learning from industry leaders.

Education

MA Entertainment Arts and Engineering University of Utah, 2024

Location

Salt Lake City, Utah
